bio: These domino Yo-kai are forever falling over themselves to apologize for every little thing.

soultimate.name: Endless Apology
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Drop foe's movement speed by 50% and Move Meter speed by 30% for 20 seconds.
soultimate.description: Damage nearby foes. Briefly decrease speed.

skill.effect: Temporarily go into Secrecy when in danger.
skill.name: Bow Out

name: Bowminos
